item.title: Matplotlib in Data Driven SEO
item.description: At Whites Agency we analyze big unstructured data to increases client's online visibility. We share our story of how we used Matplotlib to present the complicated data in a simple and reader-friendly way.

item.title: Using Matplotlib to Advocate for Postdocs
